TextAsset.value: U-umm, we’re not supposed to yell in detention…
Ha ha, you got in trouble…
I’ll… I’ll get your face in trouble!
Yo! Cuz, why are you being so mean to me?!
I’m just teasing you… That’s what friends do.
Taira! Some of us are trying to study.
(Taira’s pretty fun to hang out with…
I’m glad I decided to sit with him.
It’s helping the time pass pretty easily…)
Hey Cuz… did you see that?
That Blue Max nerd just walked right out of detention room!
That’s, like, way against the rules!
You care about rules all of a sudden?
C’mon, let’s go get some revenge on that guy!
(He’s actually getting up and following Blue Max out?
Doesn’t that mean he’s breaking the rules too?
Well, he can go do whatever he wants.
Just because we’re sort of friends doesn’t mean I have to follow him around.
He’ll probably just end up getting distracted by paint drying on the wall, haha.
Or trip over and hurt himself…
Or go into a revenge rage…
Alright, right! I’ll go after him! I doubt anyone will notice me slip out...
Whaddya got to say for yourself, you little blue punk?!
I saw you sneakin’ outta detention, bro!
What, you think I’m blind or something?!
You told me to meet you out here!
You had to meet me for an appointment…
(It would’ve been cooler to say “an appointment with revenge”...
C’mon, I can just give you my lunch money like always...
Tryin’ to out-thought me with your brain twisters, huh?
I’m a warrior with a fighting heart…
He’s scary when he gets like this…
And besides. If he wants revenge-
Blue Max must have done something bad to him.
You scored higher than me on yesterday’s history test, bro!
That’s a great disrespect to me…
I only got a C+ on that test!
You think you’re better than me, huh??
Taira’s lifting him up by his jacket…
He’s going to hurt Blue Max!)
I… I won’t let you be a bully, Taira.
Even if you say you like me!
(... I don’t think he’s gonna try to hit me back.)
Which one of these delinquents hit you?!
B-But ${slot:playerName} was only trying to help me, Principal DIG DUG!
Help you beat up poor Taira?!
No! Taira was trying to get revenge on me!
You jumped in front of Taira’s punch for me?!
What, so it’s okay to be a bully, just not to me?
Don’t expect me to feel bad for you.
I know ${slot:playerName} is a new student, but hazing is unacceptable at Namco High!
(... I don’t want to be a snitch…)
P-please don’t make me say, sir, I don’t want any more-
${slot:playerName} jumped in front of me, to protect me from Taira’s revenge!
My god, Blue Max, what did you do?!
No, no! Blue Max didn’t do anything!
I can’t make heads or tails of this!
All three of you are sentenced to…
It means I’ll see you all in my office.
Alright. Which one of you is talking to me first?
(Nothing left to do but wait for our judgement from Principal DIG DUG..
I haven’t been at Namco High long, but I’ve already been here twice…
But… this time, it’s not really my fault, of course.
(Taira’s just sitting there, not saying a word.
I’m so sick of hearing about revenge!
You… You just use it to justify being a huge jerk to people!
And I don’t want to be friends with someone who has bullying as his “thing”!
But… I had to do it…
I can’t believe I actually thought you were a sweet guy deep down…
I must be even stupider than you!
What, are you gonna get “revenge” on ME now?!
It’s such a bummer that you’re mad at me…
You shouldn’t only be sad because you want me to forgive you…
That makes it not a real apology.
Does this mean… you don’t want to date me?
I don’t want to date a bully who hurts people.
And I don’t get it, but…
yo, I think you gotta be right.
You’re right about lots of stuff…
But really… I had to take revenge.
Taira, you’ve mentioned this “clan” of yours before…
How can I even talk about it now?!
Cuz like, deep in my warrior heart, I can’t shake this feeling…
like if they could see me now…
They’d be mad ashamed of me!
(I put my hand on his hand, because I couldn’t think of anything to say.
We waited there in silence a little while longer, before we both got chewed out by Principal DIG DUG for fighting.
But of all the things that happened that day…
That moment, with my hand on his,
is the one lingering strongest in my memory.)
